data.text: Mixi naxan tondima marakɔrɔsi ra,
Tinxintɔɛ na sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ, ɲama sɛɛwama nɛ,
Lɔnni rafan mixi naxan ma, na a baba rasɛɛwama nɛ,
Mangɛ bɔxi rasabatima tinxinyi nan na,
Mixi naxan a boore tamixiyama,
Mixi ɲaaxi xa yunubi findixi gantanyi nan na a bɛ,
Tinxintɔɛ katama nɛ tinxinyi xa raba setaree bɛ,
Mixi mayelee a niyama nɛ taakae xa xɔnɔ,
Xa kiiti lu xaxilima nun xaxilitare tagi,
Faxɛtie tinxintɔɛ xɔnma,
Xaxilitare bɔɲɛ xa te mafura,
Mangɛ na bira wule fɔxɔ ra, a xa mixi birin findima nɛ mixi ɲaaxie ra.
Fe keren na setare nun mixi kobi tagi: Alatala nan e birin daa.
Mangɛ naxan setare makiitima nɔndi ra,
Di xurufe luxusinyi ra, na a niyama nɛ a xaxili sɔtɔ,
Mixi ɲaaxie na sɛnbɛ sɔtɔ, yunubie gboma nɛ,
I xa di matinxin alako i xa lu bɔɲɛsa kui, a ɲɛrɛ ki xa i rasɛɛwa.
Xa ɲama mu Ala xa fe toma,
Wɔyɛnyi xa mu konyi matinxinma.
Xaxilitare fisa mixi bɛ,
Konyi naxan kanyi bara a kana kabi a dimɛdi tɛmui,
Bɔɲɛte nan gere raminima, a findi yunubie ra.
Yɛtɛ igboɲa mixi rayaagima nɛ,
Mixi naxan kafuma muɲɛti ma, na bara a yɛtɛ gan.
Gaaxufe mixi ya ra, na findima gantanyi nan na,
Mixi gbegbe mangɛ xa hinnɛ fenma,
Mixi ɲaaxie raɲaaxu tinxintɔɛe ma,
